description:
Animation Video Maker


Ebook: Upload images or PDFs to instantly create an ebook with realistic page turning effects. Support auto-play and bookself storage.
Slide show component: Add new templates to offer more creative ways for content display.
Graphic Text Effects: Create a variety of graphic and text effects like Text floofing the screen, Text floating to make your content visually striking.
Video: Add green screen keying feature with one-click keying. Support red-green and yellow-blue tone values.
Animation: Optimize the entrance effect – Unfold Scroll. Support the selection of scroll style.
Mask: Scene mark supports setting the mask entrance motion from small to large.
Operation: Text format brush supports double-click to apply multiple times.
Animation effect: Custom entrance/emphasis/exit animation effects can be saved for easy one-click reuse.
Operation: Optimize the timeline insert/delete time operation to improve the user experience.
Scene: Optimize the scene insert operation and drag-and-drop .sc files into the app.
Tool: Add new chart templates and optimize chart operations for a smoother experience.
Shapes: Optimize the editing of lines and rectangles for a smoother experience.
Operation: Add shortcut keys. Use Alt + drag for quick copy and Shift + Alt + drag for vertical/horizontal copy after selecting elements.
Operation: Optimize the operation of group/upgroup elements for a smoother experience.
Animation: Optimize the emphasis effect – LieFlatMD to make any element fall down.
Shapes: Add FlowLineShape for one-click flowing line effects.
Slide: Upgrade the transition animation setting window. Add new transition animations.
Animation: Add Text Fill animation effect. Select the text fill-in position, and the text will be filled in word by word according to the animation effect.
Animation: Add 8 entrance, 5 emphasis, 6 exit, 10 transition animation effects.
Text: Fixed issue where text would disapper after applying text effects.
Roles: Fixed issue where the add action button failed on the timeline after adding a custom role.
Others: Known bugs fixed.
